    CannyEdgeFilterSettings  
    CIEChromaticity
    see http://hyperphysics.phy-astr.gsu.edu/hbase/vision/cie.html and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CIE_1931_color_space#mediaviewer/File:CIE1931xy_blank.svg
    ClosedCurveAndJunctionFinder
    Looks through each curve to see if the start and ends meet within an allowed gap, and if so, replaces the PairIntArray with a PairIntArrayWithColor and color='1'.
    ClrGradientDescriptor  
    ClrIntensityDescriptor  
    CMDLineCornerDetector
    a wrapper to allow a user to run parts of the application from a command line interface (for corner detection).
    CMDLineInflectionUtil
    a wrapper to allow a user to run parts of the application from a command line interface (for inflection detection and image transformation calculation).
    CMDLineMain
    a wrapper to suggest command line usage options.
    ContourFinder
    class to identity contours in scale space images.
    CornerRegion
    class to hold a few details from the creation of corners that help later to match corners.
    CorrespondenceList  
    CSSContourMatcher
    class to match the contours extracted from two images and match them.
    CSSContourMatcherWrapper
    class to use CSSContourMatcher to match the given contours lists from the edges of two different images with logic to retry with reverse ordered lists when needed for scales < 1..
    CurvatureScaleSpaceContour
    class holding data for a contour for an edge in a scale space image.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceCornerDetector
    The code is implemented from interpreting several papers by the authors Farzin Mokhtarian and Alan Mackworth.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceCurvesMaker  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImageMaker
    given an image, creates scale space maps to find inflection points and creates scale space contours for the closed curves from those points.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImageMaker.DescendingScaleSpaceComparator  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImagePoint  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceInflectionEdgeMapper
    class to map contours from edges from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceInflectionMapper
    class to map contours from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceInflectionSingleEdgeMapper
    class to map contours from edge1 from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    DarkSkyRainbowColors  
    DescendingSigmaComparator  
    DescendingSigmaComparator2
    reorders the lists by the largest sigma in the first item.
    DFSConnectedGroupsFinder
    adapted from https://code.google.com/p/two-point-correlation/source/browse/src/main/java/algorithms/compGeometry/clustering/twopointcorrelation/AbstractGroupFinder.java and https://code.google.com/p/two-point-correlation/source/browse/src/main/java/algorithms/compGeometry/clustering/twopointcorrelation/DFSGroupFinder.java under MIT License (MIT), Nichole King 2013
    DFSContiguousValueFinder
    adapted from https://code.google.com/p/two-point-correlation/source/browse/src/main/java/algorithms/compGeometry/clustering/twopointcorrelation/AbstractGroupFinder.java and https://code.google.com/p/two-point-correlation/source/browse/src/main/java/algorithms/compGeometry/clustering/twopointcorrelation/DFSGroupFinder.java under MIT License (MIT), Nichole King 2013
    DiagZeroWidener
    looks for diagonal zeros and widens the empty area by setting the opposing diagonal to zero too.
    DiagZeroWidener.Pattern  
    DistanceTransform
    Euclidean square distance transforms are computed for every zero pixel relative to a non-zero point.
    DoubleLinkedCircularList
    a doubly linked list with a sentinel in between the last and first item.
    EdgeExtractor
    Edge extractor operates on an image that has already been reduced to single pixel width lines and extracts edges from it, attempting to make the longest edges it can.
    EdgeExtractorForBlobBorder  
    EdgeExtractorWithJunctions
    Edge extractor operates on an image that has already been reduced to single pixel width lines and extracts edges from it, attempting to make the longest edges it can - this specific edge extractor stores and uses junction information, so is not as fast as EdgeExtractor.java.
    EdgeFilterProducts
    a wrapper to hold the results of an edge image filter, specifically the gradient X, gradient Y, the combined gradients XY, and the theta image.
    EdgeMatcher
    class to match the edges extracted from two images.
    ErosionFilter
    The erosion filter iterates over all pixels in the image, checking whether the current non-null pixel can be nulled without disconnecting any adjacent pixels.
    ExternalEdgeFinder
    class to find where edges in a set of edges from one list are external to the entire bounds of the reference edges.
    FeatureComparisonStat  
    FeatureMatcher

    RainbowFinder

    RainbowFinder.Hull  
    RANSACSolver
    given matched point lists, determine the best epipolar solution using a 7-point epipolar calculation and random draws of 7 points from the matched point lists under the assumption that some of the matched points are not true (correct) matches.
    ScaleSpaceCurvature  
    ScaleSpaceCurve
    Holds X(t, sigma), Y(t, sigma), k(t, sigma) and the array t where t is the range of indexes for the curve in edges, normalized to values that range from 0 to 1.
    ScaleSpaceCurve2
    extends ScaleSpaceCurve to hold the gaussian 2nd derivatives in x, and y
    ScaleSpaceCurveImage
    Holds the inflection points of a curve convolved over many sigma until there are no new inflection points.
    SegmentedImageHelper
    a class to maintain the segmented images used by the blob scale finder.
    ShapeMatcher  
    SkylineExtractor

    SobelX
    shows horizontal changes in an image
    SobelY
    shows vertical changes in an image

    CurvatureScaleSpaceMapperState  
    SegmentedImageHelper.SegmentationType
    BINARY = KMPP for k=2 followed by adaptive mean thresholding (scl=20/binFactor); GREYSCALE_KMPP = KMPP for k=2; COLOR_POLARCIEXY_ADAPT = color to greyscale using polar theta of CIEXY scale space followed by adaptive mean thresholding (scl=4?); COLOR_POLARCIEXY = color to greyscale using polar theta of CIEXY.
